content: Review Phase 3 changes: UnifiedTypeInfo consolidation to embed TypeInfo
Update UnifiedTypeInfo struct to embed TypeInfo instead of duplicating fields
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after UnifiedTypeInfo struct changes
Update UnifiedTypeInfo::from_type_info constructor to use embedded TypeInfo
Update UnifiedTypeInfo::for_enum_type to work with embedded TypeInfo
Update UnifiedTypeInfo::for_math_type to work with embedded TypeInfo
Update UnifiedTypeInfo::for_transform_type to work with embedded TypeInfo
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after constructor updates
Update all UnifiedTypeInfo method accessors to use self.type_info.field
Update is_math_type() to delegate to TypeInfo::is_math_type()
Update get_mutation_paths() to use self.type_info.mutation_paths
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Update to_correction() method to use embedded TypeInfo fields
Update transform_value() method to access TypeInfo fields correctly
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after method updates
Update CorrectionInfo::to_json() to use nested type_info.type_info paths
Update enum_variant transformer to work with embedded TypeInfo
Update math_type transformer to work with embedded TypeInfo
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after transformer updates
Update discovery_context.rs to use new UnifiedTypeInfo structure
Update extras_discovery.rs to construct UnifiedTypeInfo correctly
Update guidance.rs to access embedded TypeInfo fields
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Update pattern_correction.rs for new UnifiedTypeInfo structure
Update recovery_result.rs to handle embedded TypeInfo
Update retry.rs for new type structure
Update serialization_check.rs to use embedded TypeInfo
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after engine module updates
Update all tests in tests.rs to match new UnifiedTypeInfo structure
Run cargo nextest run to validate all changes
STOP if test failures - review with user
Final cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Subagent: STOP and return control
Main: Task new subagent for code review (read-only)
Review suggestions with user
